title: ISic000848. I.Sicily inscription 000848
body:
Facsimile Images

Ζώσιμε χρηστὲ καὶ
ἄμενπτε χαῖρε
ἔζησας ἔτη
((·)) ιδ´ ((·))
5μῆνας πέντε´
((·)) μίαν´ ἡμέραν ((·))

Apparatus criticus

Text of Orsi, checked against photograph

English translation

Zosimos, worthy and blameless, farewell! You lived 14 years, five months, one day.

commentary

Note that IG 14.46 (ISic000863) is on the other side of this stone

bibliography

  • 14.0031 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 3.5401 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
  • Orsi 1893 299 no. 81 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
  • Orsi 2018 Tacc. 2, p. 22 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002617
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
